message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. This is a competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $15000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Hi Bob, I understand your desire to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $15000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $16500. This is a fair compromise that still reflects the product's value to me.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $14000 for the product. I think this is a reasonable price considering its value to me.

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to save some more money, but I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'll make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $16000. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
